CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( Contact_Age__c ), IMAGE("/s.gif", "No Age Defined"), IF(Contact_Age__c > 18, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015d00000005ykL&oid=00D5B000000DfMz&lastMod=1371829547000", "Contact is an Adult"), IF( Contact_Age__c < 18, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015d00000005ykN&oid=00D5B000000DfMz&lastMod=1371829547000", "Contact is a Minor"), IMAGE("/s.gif", "Status Flag") )))
CustomField.label: Adult
